contents.content: UNIT 03 面试礼仪 Interview Etiquette
杰克和玛丽在谈论面试中的致谢词。

contents.title: 杰克：致谢词是面试中必不可少的一部分。
contents.answer: Jack: Acknowledgments play a necessary part in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：是的。诚恳地致谢是个人良好素养的体现。
contents.answer: Mary: Sure. Kind acknowledgments can show one's good attainment.

contents.title: 杰克：我们在日常生活中常常忽略致谢用语，觉得它可有可无。
contents.answer: Jack: We often ignore the acknowledgments in our daily life, and consider them as disposable.

contents.title: 玛丽：其实不是的。致谢词会帮你给别人留下好的印象，在公共场合中尤其如此。
contents.answer: Mary: Actually, that's not true. Acknowledgments can help you leave a good impression on others, especially in the public places.

contents.content: 职场达人小技巧  面试致谢不可忘  一个求职者能否赢得面试的成功，影响因素很多，但其自身的礼仪素养及其在面试过程中的表现，则是一个不容忽视的因素。许多求职者面试失败，就是因为礼仪素养的缺失。

contents.title: 杰克：面试中应当特别注意致谢用语。
contents.answer: Jack: We should particularly pay attention to acknowledgments in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：面试开始时，最好对面试官给予面试机会表示感谢。
contents.answer: Mary: In the beginning of the interview, it is best that you make acknowledgments for the opportunity of the interview.

contents.title: 杰克：当你入座时，别忘记说声谢谢。
contents.answer: Jack: Don't forget to say “Thank you” when you take a seat.

contents.title: 玛丽：当面试官对你的着装、经历、言辞表示肯定时，也要致谢。
contents.answer: Mary: Make acknowledgments as well when the interviewer thinks highly of your dressing, experience, or words.

contents.title: 杰克：这样会赢得面试官的好感。
contents.answer: Jack: You can win a good impression of the interviewer in this way.

contents.content: 面试时适时而诚恳地向面试官致以感谢，无疑会赢得面试官的好感，拉近彼此间的距离。不要认为一句谢谢无足轻重，可有可无。事实上，它是个人良好素养的体现，可以给面试官留下好的印象。

contents.title: 玛丽：也有利于求职者展示自己的良好素养。
contents.answer: Mary: Acknowledgments can also help the job-hunters to show their good attainment.

contents.title: 杰克：最后，面试结束时，也要向面试官致谢。
contents.answer: Jack: Finally, at the end of the interview, make acknowledgments to the interviewer again.

contents.title: 玛丽：面带微笑，态度诚恳，是致谢的基本要求。
contents.answer: Mary: Smiles and kind attitudes are the basics of acknowledgments.

contents.content: 在面试结束后可以写邮件或打电话向面试官致谢。一来显示出你的礼貌，二来可以加深用人单位对你的印象，同时也方便你对应聘结果进行询问。在这个过程中你也可以重申你对这份工作的兴趣，补充一些你在面试时遗漏的内容。电话或书面致谢时，切记要注意言辞，不要让对方认为你是在逼迫他马上做出决定，通常只要表达出自己的谢意以及期望就可以了。

contents.title: 诚恳的致谢词会使你在面试中留下好的印象。
contents.answer: Kind acknowledgments will help you leave a good impression in the interview.

contents.title: 致谢可以展示出你的良好素养。
contents.answer: Acknowledgments can show your good attainment.

contents.title: 应当为获得面试机会而向面试官诚恳致谢。
contents.answer: You should make acknowledgments kindly to the interviewer for the opportunity to have the interview.

contents.title: 谢谢您给我这个机会与您面谈。
contents.answer: Thank you for the opportunity to have an interview with you.

contents.title: 我不知道该如何表达对您的感激之情。
contents.answer: I don't know how to show my gratitude to you.

contents.title: 与您交谈同样让我感到愉快。
contents.answer: I've enjoyed talking with you, too.

contents.title: 无论如何，还是要感谢您。
contents.answer: Thank you anyway.

contents.title: 您想的真周到。
contents.answer: You are so thoughtful.

contents.title: 我希望不会给您添太多麻烦。
contents.answer: I hope this will not cause a lot of trouble.

contents.title: 面带微笑，态度诚恳，是致谢的基本要求。
contents.answer: Smiles and kind attitudes are the basics of acknowledgments.

contents.content: think highly of 肯定，赞扬
